verses.roman:
hanumān-āveśe prabhu vṛkṣa-śākhā lañā
laṅkā-gaḍe caḍi' phele gaḍa bhāṅgiyā

synonyms: hanumān-āveśe—in the emotion of being Hanumān; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vṛkṣa-śākhā lañā—taking a large branch of a tree; laṅkā-gaḍe—on the Laṅkā fort; caḍi'-ascending; phele—breaks down; gaḍa—the fort; bhāṅgiyā—dismantling.
translation: Displaying the emotions of Hanumān, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took up a large tree branch, and, mounting the walls of the Laṅkā fort, began to dismantle it.
